Overview

Display ChatGPT response as a suggestion to complete emails, Powered By OpenAI


The Email Generator is an email writing app powered by ChatGPT. It generates AI draft emails based on the prompts you give it. Eliminate 100â€™s of hours each year writing emails. 

The email generator is perfect for busy professionals who want to write emails accurately and quickly. It is great for people who are non-native English speakers who want to write in perfect English. An AI virtual assistant becomes the perfect email assistant. 

Spend more time on what matters and less time on emails.


HOW TO USE

1) Click on the extension icon
2) A popup window will appear
3) Briefly enter what do you want to write about and hit "Generate Email" button.
4) Result screen with AI generated mail will appear and the same will be copied to outlook mail body



What is your privacy policy?
This tool respects your privacy and does not use ads, cookies, or third-party trackers.
